content:
Hi everyone,

If you'd like to join the next Dataverse Sustainability working group meeting on May 7th, you can find the relevant information below:
WG Meeting May 7, 2024
Time:              17 CEST / 15 UTC
Where:           Zoom (https://deic.zoom.us/j/69885260340) 
Notes: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1uBCeLOkHuW0BHMdMbAT3zh8gsaPFWHR1NCTVAR7Xh_A/edit
Agenda:

  • ITAV Workshop recap
    Feedback (& additions if necessary)
    Next ITAV Workshop ?

  • NSF Pathways: update after Apr. 29th meeting

  • Calendar update (finish before summer, or continue afterwards necessary?)
  • Feedback GDCC steering committee
  • Any other business

If you want to join all future WG meetings, please let us know, and we’ll forward all the future agenda items to you. It’s always on the same zoom link and the future dates are at the top of the general notes doc (https://docs.google.com/document/d/1uBCeLOkHuW0BHMdMbAT3zh8gsaPFWHR1NCTVAR7Xh_A/edit.

Kind regards,
Dieuwertje and Dimitri
